title: I just get suspended for no reason !!!!!!!
body: I just get suspended for no reason !!!!!!! It says they will warning they will send in my email but i check my email i didnt get any warning im like what the fack what did i do why i get fking suspended.... I even spent 100 dollars on my account today!!  WTF are you guys doing !!!!!

replies.body: It looks like your account was locked as a protective measure.  No worries, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account team can make sure it safely gets back in you rhands!
